00037 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_SEC
00038 #include <linux/init.h>
00039 #include <linux/module.h>
00040 #include <linux/slab.h>
00041 #include <linux/dcache.h>
00042 #include <linux/fs.h>
00043 #include <linux/mutex.h>
00044 
00045 #include <obd.h>
00046 #include <obd_class.h>
00047 #include <obd_support.h>
00048 #include <lustre/lustre_idl.h>
00049 #include <lustre_net.h>
00050 #include <lustre_import.h>
00051 #include <lprocfs_status.h>
00052 #include <lustre_sec.h>
00053 
00054 #include "gss_err.h"
00055 #include "gss_internal.h"
00056 #include "gss_api.h"
00057 
00058 static struct proc_dir_entry *gss_proc_root = NULL;
00059 static struct proc_dir_entry *gss_proc_lk = NULL;
00060 
00061 /*
00062  * statistic of "out-of-sequence-window"
00063  */
00064 static struct {
00065         spinlock_t      oos_lock;
00066         atomic_t        oos_cli_count;          /* client occurrence */
00067         int             oos_cli_behind;         /* client max seqs behind */
00068         atomic_t        oos_svc_replay[3];      /* server replay detected */
00069         atomic_t        oos_svc_pass[3];        /* server verified ok */
00070 } gss_stat_oos = {
00071         .oos_cli_count  = ATOMIC_INIT(0),
00072         .oos_cli_behind = 0,
00073         .oos_svc_replay = { ATOMIC_INIT(0), },
00074         .oos_svc_pass   = { ATOMIC_INIT(0), },
00075 };
00076 
00077 void gss_stat_oos_record_cli(int behind)
00078 {
00079         atomic_inc(&gss_stat_oos.oos_cli_count);
00080 
00081         spin_lock(&gss_stat_oos.oos_lock);
00082         if (behind > gss_stat_oos.oos_cli_behind)
00083                 gss_stat_oos.oos_cli_behind = behind;
00084         spin_unlock(&gss_stat_oos.oos_lock);
00085 }
00086 
00087 void gss_stat_oos_record_svc(int phase, int replay)
00088 {
00089         LASSERT(phase >= 0 && phase <= 2);
00090 
00091         if (replay)
00092                 atomic_inc(&gss_stat_oos.oos_svc_replay[phase]);
00093         else
00094                 atomic_inc(&gss_stat_oos.oos_svc_pass[phase]);
00095 }
00096 
00097 static int gss_proc_oos_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00098 {
00099         seq_printf(m, "seqwin:             %u\n"
00100                    "backwin:            %u\n"
00101                    "client fall behind seqwin\n"
00102                    "  occurrence:       %d\n"
00103                    "  max seq behind:   %d\n"
00104                    "server replay detected:\n"
00105                    "  phase 0:          %d\n"
00106                    "  phase 1:          %d\n"
00107                    "  phase 2:          %d\n"
00108                    "server verify ok:\n"
00109                    "  phase 2:          %d\n",
00110                    GSS_SEQ_WIN_MAIN,
00111                    GSS_SEQ_WIN_BACK,
00112                    atomic_read(&gss_stat_oos.oos_cli_count),
00113                    gss_stat_oos.oos_cli_behind,
00114                    atomic_read(&gss_stat_oos.oos_svc_replay[0]),
00115                    atomic_read(&gss_stat_oos.oos_svc_replay[1]),
00116                    atomic_read(&gss_stat_oos.oos_svc_replay[2]),
00117                    atomic_read(&gss_stat_oos.oos_svc_pass[2]));
00118         return 0;
00119 }
00120 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO(gss_proc_oos);
00121 
00122 static ssize_t
00123 gss_proc_write_secinit(struct file *file, const char *buffer,
00124                                   size_t count, loff_t *off)
00125 {
00126         int rc;
00127 
00128         rc = gss_do_ctx_init_rpc((char *) buffer, count);
00129         if (rc) {
00130                 LASSERT(rc < 0);
00131                 return rc;
00132         }
00133         return count;
00134 }
00135 
00136 static const struct file_operations gss_proc_secinit = {
00137         .write = gss_proc_write_secinit,
00138 };
00139 
00140 static struct lprocfs_vars gss_lprocfs_vars[] = {
00141         { .name =       "replays",
00142           .fops =       &gss_proc_oos_fops      },
00143         { .name =       "init_channel",
00144           .fops =       &gss_proc_secinit,
00145           .proc_mode =  0222                    },
00146         { NULL }
00147 };
00148 
00149 /*
00150  * for userspace helper lgss_keyring.
00151  *
00152  * debug_level: [0, 4], defined in utils/gss/lgss_utils.h
00153  */
00154 static int gss_lk_debug_level = 1;
00155 
00156 static int gss_lk_proc_dl_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00157 {
00158         seq_printf(m, "%u\n", gss_lk_debug_level);
00159         return 0;
00160 }
00161 
00162 static ssize_t
00163 gss_lk_proc_dl_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00164                                 size_t count, loff_t *off)
00165 {
00166         int rc;
00167         __s64 val;
00168 
00169         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00170         if (rc < 0)
00171                 return rc;
00172 
00173         if (val < 0 || val > 4)
00174                 return -ERANGE;
00175 
00176         gss_lk_debug_level = val;
00177 
00178         return count;
00179 }
00180 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(gss_lk_proc_dl);
00181 
00182 static struct lprocfs_vars gss_lk_lprocfs_vars[] = {
00183         { .name =       "debug_level",
00184           .fops =       &gss_lk_proc_dl_fops    },
00185         { NULL }
00186 };
00187 
00188 void gss_exit_lproc(void)
00189 {
00190         if (gss_proc_lk) {
00191                 lprocfs_remove(&gss_proc_lk);
00192                 gss_proc_lk = NULL;
00193         }
00194 
00195         if (gss_proc_root) {
00196                 lprocfs_remove(&gss_proc_root);
00197                 gss_proc_root = NULL;
00198         }
00199 }
00200 
00201 int gss_init_lproc(void)
00202 {
00203         int     rc;
00204 
00205         spin_lock_init(&gss_stat_oos.oos_lock);
00206 
00207         gss_proc_root = lprocfs_register("gss", sptlrpc_proc_root,
00208                                          gss_lprocfs_vars, NULL);
00209         if (IS_ERR(gss_proc_root)) {
00210                 rc = PTR_ERR(gss_proc_root);
00211                 gss_proc_root = NULL;
00212                 GOTO(out, rc);
00213         }
00214 
00215         gss_proc_lk = lprocfs_register("lgss_keyring", gss_proc_root,
00216                                        gss_lk_lprocfs_vars, NULL);
00217         if (IS_ERR(gss_proc_lk)) {
00218                 rc = PTR_ERR(gss_proc_lk);
00219                 gss_proc_lk = NULL;
00220                 GOTO(out, rc);
00221         }
00222 
00223         return 0;
00224 
00225 out:
00226         CERROR("failed to initialize gss lproc entries: %d\n", rc);
00227         gss_exit_lproc();
00228 
00229         return rc;
00230 }
